title: St. Francis’ Remains, Rarely Seen, Go on Display in Assisi
summary_full: The bones of Italy’s patron saint will be shown to the public for a month, to mark the 800th anniversary of his death.
summary_public: The bones of Italy’s patron saint will be shown to the public for a month, to mark the 800th anniversary of his death.
